feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-13T21:58:09.640740Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;黑暗美国小说家科马克麦卡锡逝世，享年 89 岁</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/13/books/cormac -mccarthy-dead.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:57:42.786624Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/13/books/ cormac-mccarthy-dead.html"/>; <author>; <name>;benbreen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benbreen</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/06/14/obituaries/00mccarthy_cormac-1-print1/00mccarthy_cormac-1-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=高档”风格=“宽度：220px； height: 275px;" />;<br />;隐居作家科马克·麦卡锡 (Cormac McCarthy) 去世，享年 89 岁，享年 89 岁。条件，赢得了无数奖项并被改编成电影，但也因其自觉的男性气质和缺乏著名的女性角色而招致批评。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cormac-mccarthy-novelist- of-a-darker-america-is-dead-at-89" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316079" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;麦当劳刚刚在 2023 年推出了一款全新的 Game Boy 游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://retrododo.com/mcdonalds-grimaces-birthday/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20:57:42.787139Z </updated>; <link href="https://retrododo.com/mcdonalds-grimaces-birthday/"/>; <author>; <name>;outime</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=outtime</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://retrododo.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/grimaces-birthday-gameboy- game-800x450.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;麦当劳发布了一款名为 Grimace's Birthday 的新 Game Boy Color 游戏，由 Gumpy Function 使用 GB Studio 开发。该游戏涉及扮演 Grimace 在滑板上，试图在他的生日那天找到他的朋友聚会。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mcdonald-s-just-dropped-a-brand-new-game-boy-game-in-2023" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316134" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;JupyterLab 4.0</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.jupyter.org/jupyterlab-4- 0-is-here-388d05e03442?gi=692635ec8178</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T19:57:42.787562Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.jupyter.org/jupyterlab-4 -0-is-here-388d05e03442?gi=692635ec8178"/>; <author>; <name>;jonbaer</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jonbaer</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://miro.medium.com/v2/resize:fit:1200/1*Y3aNGoRED2q0pWjlHmr9wg.png" style="width: 220px; height: 119px;" />;<br />;JupyterLab 4.0 是 Jupyter 开发环境的最新版本，现已在 PyPI 和 conda-forge 上可用。它包括更快的渲染、升级的文本编辑器、新的扩展管理器、改进的文档搜索、UI 和辅助功能改进以及错误修复。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jupyterlab-4-0" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= “https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315796” target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;开源医院价格数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dolthub.com/repositories/dolthub/transparency-in-pricing/数据/主要/速率</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:57:42.787944Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.dolthub.com/repositories/dolthub/transparency-in-pricing /data/main/rate"/>; <author>; <name>;alecst</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alecst</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#open-source-hospital-price-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316883" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ZX81 机械键盘</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T20 :57:42.788309Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard"/>; <author>; <name>;zoenolan</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=zoenolan</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/swetland/zx81-keyboard/main/images/带有自定义键帽的键盘.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于与 Sinclair ZX81 及其现代娱乐产品 ZX81+38 兼容的机械键盘。存储库包含键盘的设计文件、导出版本和图像。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zx81-mechanical-keyboard" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36316311" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;快速工作比看起来更重要（2015 年）</stitle>; <id>;http://jsomers.net/blog/speed-matters</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T16 :57:42.788658Z</updated>; <link href="http://jsomers.net/blog/speed-matters"/>; <作者>; <name>;cal85</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=cal85</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://jsomers.net/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/ Screen-Shot-2015-07-26-at-6.03.14-PM.png" style="width: 220px; height: 316px;" />;<br />;本文提供了有关如何排查和修复网站上的 500 错误的信息，这是 Web 服务器在满足客户端。它涵盖了错误的常见原因，例如文件所有权、权限模式、.htaccess 文件中的冲突行和进程限制等问题，并提供了有关如何在 cPanel 中编辑 .htaccess 文件和文件权限的说明。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#working-quickly-is-more-important-than-it-seems-2015" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312295" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;完成你的项目</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/readme/guides/finish-your-projects</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T18:57:42.789013Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/readme/guides/finish-your-projects"/>; <author>; <name>;aarondf</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aarondf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.ctfassets.net /s5uo95nf6njh/7AlDzZ2iGukvOe26kfIgLJ/fe6c6ab58b880503c20f27a3e364b83f/Open_source_staircase__1___1_.jpg?w=1200&fm=jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 257px;" />;<br />;自述项目旨在通过承认过程中的困难来鼓励人们完成他们的开源项目。这篇文章讨论了从开始项目的最初兴奋到转变的挑战完成它的不那么迷人的工作，并提供了克服这些障碍的策略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#finish-your-projects" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313671" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重写 Ruby 解析器</stitle>; <id>;https://railsatscale.com//2023-06-12-rewriting -the-ruby-parser/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T13:57:42.789365Z</updated>; <link href="https://railsatscale.com//2023-06-12-rewriting- the-ruby-parser/"/>; <author>; <name>;kddeisz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kddeisz</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://railsatscale.com/2023-06-12-rewriting-the-ruby-parser/error-tolerance.png" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;Shopify 开发了一种名为 YARP 的新 Ruby 解析器，以解决当前 CRuby 解析器长期存在的问题，包括可维护性、容错性、可移植性和性能。YARP 可以解析语义等效的语法在 Shopify 的主代码库、GitHub 的主代码库、CRuby 和从 ruby​​gems.org 下载的 100 个最流行的 gem 中的每个 Ruby 文件上将树转换为 Ruby 3.3。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rewriting-the -ruby-parser" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310130" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Track HN：Show HN Stories 的存活率< /stitle>; <id>;https://nami.land/2023/06/11/track-hn-analyze-survival-rate-of-120-396-show-hn-posts-june-2023.html</id >; <更新>;2023-06-13T17:57:42.789719Z</更新>; <link href="https://nami.land/2023/06/11/track-hn-analyze-survival-rate-of-120 -396-show-hn-posts-june-2023.html"/>; <author>; <name>;namiwang</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=namiwang</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nami.land/assets/thn/2306/Show%20HN%20submitted%20by%20year.png" style="width: 220px; height: 140px;" />;<br />;剧透警告：许多好的项目都没有幸存下来 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#track-hn-survival-rate-of-show -hn-stories" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313562" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：重新发送 (YC W23) – 电子邮件面向使用 React 的开发人员的 API</stitle>; <id>;https://resend.com</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T12:57:42.790081Z</updated>; <link href="https://resend .com"/>; <author>; <name>;zenorocha</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zenorocha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://resend.com/_next/image?url=%2Fstatic%2Flanding-page%2Fbghero.png&w=2048&q=75" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Resend 是一个面向开发人员的电子邮件 API，它提供可靠且易于使用的电子邮件发送解决方案。它提供诸如多区域支持和专用 IP 等功能以提高送达率。< href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-resend-yc-w23-email-api-for-developers-using-react" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36309120" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;文本编辑器数据结构</stitle>; <id>;https://cdacamar.github.io/data%20structures/algorithms/benchmarking /text%20editors/c++/editor-data-structures/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T16:57:42.790441Z</更新>; <link href="https://cdacamar.github.io/data %20structures/algorithms/benchmarking/text%20editors/c++/editor-data-structures/"/>; <author>; <name>;starfreakclone</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= starfreakclone</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdacamar.github.io/images/rope-1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 245px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了文本编辑器编程的挑战以及作者改造自己编辑器内部数据结构的旅程。他们探索了各种数据结构，包括巨型字符串、间隙缓冲区和绳索，最终定下了一块表数据结构。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#text-editor-data-structures" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312488" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;自学计算机科学功能</stitle>; <id>;https://functionalcs.github.io/curriculum/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T16:57:42.790791Z</更新>; <link href="https://functionalcs.github.io/curriculum/"/>; <author>; <name>;ggr2342</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ggr2342</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文是对理论感兴趣的人的各种计算机科学主题资源的集合，其中关于学习策略的建议以及书籍和课程的建议。作者强调了每天投入时间学习和接受略高于个人技能水平的挑战的重要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#teach-yourself-computer-science-functionally" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36312603" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;C 中的一个简单哈希表</stitle>; <id>;https://theleo.zone/posts/hashmap-in-c/</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -13T19:57:42.791136Z</updated>; <link href="https://theleo.zone/posts/hashmap-in-c/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章解释了如何在C中实现一个简单的哈希表，包括哈希函数的使用，指针和内存段。它还讨论了哈希表背后的设计决策及其性能特征。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-simple-hash-table-in-c" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36302552" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;由洋葱路由器 (Tor) 提供支持的微博</stitle>; <id>;https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app。 Blackpage.Blackpage&hl=en_US</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T19:57:42.791495Z</updated>; <link href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app .Blackpage.Blackpage&hl=en_US"/>; <author>; <name>;MCrekt</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=MCrekt</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;Blackpage 是一个社交博客平台，允许用户在考虑隐私的情况下从他们的移动设备向暗网发布内容。这是一个极客为极客打造的无广告平台。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-microblog-powered-by-the-onion-router-tor" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315989" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;BuildZoom (YC W13) 正在招聘一名增长助理</stitle>; <id>;https://jobs.lever.co/buildzoom</id>; < updated>;2023-06-13T17:57:42.791849Z</updated>; <link href="https://jobs.lever.co/buildzoom"/>; <content type="html">;项目工程师（施工前）亚利桑那州斯科茨代尔或德克萨斯州休斯顿 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#buildzoom-yc-w13-is-hiring-a-growth-associate" target="_blank">;[摘要]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;私募股权正在收购从兽医办公室到技术的一切企业集团</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/23758492/private-equity-brendan-ballou-plunder-finance-doj</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T17:57:42.792162Z </updated>; <link href="https://www.theverge.com/23758492/private-equity-brendan-ballou-plunder-finance-doj"/>; <author>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com /thumbor/0x0:2040x1360/2400x2400/filters:focal(1020x680:1021x681):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/24722142/236699_Decoder_Brendan_Ballou_WJoel.jpg" style="宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;私募股权公司收集现金，筹集投资者现金，并举债购买公司，通常将它们从公开股票市场撤出。然后他们任命新的管理层并开始积极削减成本和周转计划，目标是出售公司或再次上市以获利。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#private-equity-is-buying-everything-from-vet- offices-to-tech-conglomerates" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313967" target="_blank">;[comments ]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;单声道漫画</stitle>; < id>;https://dtinth.github.io/comic-mono-font/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T16:57:42.792511Z</更新>; <link href="https://dtinth. github.io/comic-mono-font/"/>; <author>; <name>;lolinder</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lolinder</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://repository-images.githubusercontent.com/164606802/cd83d680-894c-11e9-83f7-c353c70df1cb" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;本文介绍了一种清晰的等宽字体，它是 Shannon Miwa 的 Comic Shanns（版本 1）的一个分支。字体系列是通过使用 Python 脚本修补原始字体创建的，可以使用在网页中包含样式表。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#comic-mono" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312200" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Johnny Decimal</stitle>; <id>;https://johnnydecimal.com/10-19-concepts/11-core/11.01-introduction/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T11:57:42.792854Z</updated>; <link href="https://johnnydecimal.com/10-19-concepts/11-core/11.01-introduction/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ralgozino</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ralgozino</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了企业中的非托管信息问题系统并提出了一个名为“Johnny Decimal”的解决方案，该解决方案涉及将信息组织到一个由十个大桶和每个桶中的十个类别组成的系统中，使用十进制编号系统轻松定位和分类信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#johnny-decimal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36308366" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;金属着色器转换器和缺失的设备范围屏障</stitle>; <id>;https://raphlinus.github.io/gpu/2023/06/12/shader-converter.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T19:57:42.793198Z</更新>; <link href="https://raphlinus.github.io/gpu/2023/06/12/shader-converter.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;raphlinus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=raphlinus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Apple 为将着色器从 DXIL 转换为 Metal，但 Metal 中缺乏对原子屏障的支持阻碍了 WebGPU 的性能，并增加了 GPU 生态系统的复杂性。作者建议关注 GPU 计算的坚实、符合规范的基础，并为 Asahi Linux 在 Apple Silicon 上实施 Vulkan 的工作欢呼。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#metal-shader-converter-and-the-missing-device-scoped-barrier" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36298798" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Obsidian-Copilot：写作和思考的原型助手</stitle>; <id>;https://eugeneyan.com/writing/obsidian-copilot /</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T14:57:42.793536Z</updated>; <link href="https://eugeneyan.com/writing/obsidian-copilot/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; alexmolas</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=alexmolas</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://eugeneyan. com/assets/og_image/copilot-og.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;这篇文章描述了名为 Obsidian-Copilot 的原型助手的开发，它通过起草段落和反思过去的日记条目来帮助写作和思考。它使用检索增强生成和 OpenSearch 以及语义索引进行检索。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#obsidian-copilot-a-prototype-assistant-for-writing-and-thinking" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310689" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;高利率能解决高通胀吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lynalden.com/inflation-vs-interest- rates/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T19:57:42.793878Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.lynalden.com/inflation-vs-interest-rates/"/>; <作者>; <name>;fuoqi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fuoqi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://www.lynalden.com/wp-content/uploads/inflation-interest-rates-feature.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：95px；" />;<br />;这篇文章探讨了通货膨胀的原因以及中央银行如何通过其政策，特别是通过利率来影响通货膨胀。它还强调了货币创造的不同来源，例如财政赤字和银行贷款，以及它们如何以不同方式促进通货膨胀。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#do-high-interest-rates-fix-high-inflation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315608" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：在浏览器中运行的 LLaMA 分词器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:57:42.794225Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js"/>; <作者>; <name>;belladoreai</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belladoreai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/ b3906fdce57337bc9b87485b03eb5c86c99fe195eafea69919b1858fc4255c52/belladoreai/llama-tokenizer-js" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;本文介绍了 LLaMA 的第一个 JavaScript 分词器，它在浏览器和 Node 中运行，具有优化的运行时间和包大小。它还将其与 Web 应用程序中使用的其他流行分词器进行了比较，并解释了 LLaMA 模型的兼容性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-llama-tokenizer-that-runs-in-browser" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36316489" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;搞砸了我的页表</stitle>; <id>;https://axleos.com/screwing-up-my-page-tables/</id >; <更新>;2023-06-13T20:57:42.794576Z</更新>; <link href="https://axleos.com/screwing-up-my-page-tables/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://axleos. com/screwing-up-my-page-tables/new_pmm_design.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：83px；" />;<br />;作者描述了他们在用 Rust 重写网络堆栈时调试内核空间内存错误的经验，以及更改帧分配策略如何导致低级内存错误浮出水面。他们最终发现他们的分页结构由于不正确的内存访问而被覆盖。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#screwing-up-my-page-tables" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Jim Keller 谈人工智能、RISC-V、Tenstorrent 向边缘 IP 的转变</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.eetimes.com/jim-keller-on-ai-risc-v-tenstorrents-move-to-edge-ip/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T13:57:42.794918Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.eetimes.com/jim-keller-on-ai-risc-v-tenstorrents-move-to-edge-ip/"/>; <author>; <name>;JoachimS</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JoachimS</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.eetimes.com /wp-content/uploads/shutterstock_2121044741.jpg?w=300" style="宽度：220px；高度：118px；" />;<br />;传奇CPU设计师Jim Keller成为AI芯片公司Tenstorrent的CEO，是开源ISA RISC-V的坚定支持者。 Tenstorrent 近期已将其 AI 加速器核心 IP 和 CPU 核心 IP 授权给 LG 电子，用于智能电视和汽车芯片。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jim-keller-on-ai-risc-v-tenstorrents-move-to-edge-ip" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310145" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Instant Brands，Instant Pot 和 Pyrex 炊具制造商，申请破产</stitle>; <id>;https://www. cbc.ca/news/business/instant-brands-bankruptcy-1.6874487</id>; <更新>;2023-06-13T14:57:42.795261Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cbc.ca /news/business/instant-brands-bankruptcy-1.6874487"/>; <author>; <name>;colinprince</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=colinprince</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.cbc.ca/1.3950688.1686669682!/fileImage/httpImage/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/16x9_780/robert-wang.jpg" style= “宽度：220px；高度：124px；” />;<br />;Instant Brands 是 Pyrex 和 Instant Pot 等厨房必需品背后的公司，由于难以控制的债务负担，已申请破产。该公司账面上有价值 5.63 亿美元的债务，近年来销售额有所下降。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#instant-brands-maker-of-instant-pot-and-pyrex-cookware-files-for-bankruptcy" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36310733" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AWS us-east-1 down</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36315300</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T19:57:42.795623Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315300"/>; <author >; <name>;rurp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rurp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了常见问题AWS us-east-1 以及一些公司如何在没有意识到后果的情况下盲目选择它。它还提到某些资源需要在 us-east-1 中的烦恼，以及指定不同的默认区域如何导致创建无用的资源来破坏事物。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#aws-us-east-1-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36315300" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;迫使美国正视童工问题的摄影师</stitle>; <id>;https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/the-photographer-who-forced- the-us-to-confront-its-child-labor-problem-180982355/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T21:24:42.795965Z</updated>; <link href="https://www. smithsonianmag.com/history/the-photographer-who-forced-the-us-to-confront-its-child-labor-problem-180982355/"/>; <author>; <name>;cratermoon</name>; <uri>; https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cratermoon</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://th-thumbnailer.cdn-si-edu.com /rL39Jd_skZBVfNEcn2Y62OX_ksE=/fit-in/1072x0/filters:focal(1429x844:1430x845)/https://tf-cmsv2-smithsonianmag-media.s3.amazonaws.com/filer_public/f1/0d/f10dc681-3be7-45bc-9d8e -b7a895d3bb17/screenshot_2023-06-12_at_95133_am.png" style="width: 220px; height: 130px;" />;<br />;带着他的相机走遍全国，Lewis Wickes Hine 捕捉到了成千上万儿童——其中一些年仅 3 岁——经常处于压抑的工作环境中。Hine 的照片的社会和政治影响一直受到人们的关注在我的脑海里。在过去的两年里，我收集了海因在 20 世纪初拍摄的 5,400 多张照片。这些图像是马里兰大学巴尔的摩郡的一个主要数字化和重新安置项目的一部分特别收藏，我在那里担任首席策展人。Hine 黑白照片的古色古香暗示着一个过去的时代——一个令人尴尬的过去，许多美国人可能认为他们已经落伍了。但是有许多关于违反童工行为的报道，其中许多涉及移民，发生在美国，随着州立法的增加，降低了法定工作年龄，很明显，Hine 的作品在今天和一个世纪前一样重要。作为一名受过训练的社会学家，Hine 于 1903 年开始拍摄照片，同时在纽约市进步的伦理文化学校任教。 1903 年至 1908 年间，他和他的学生在埃利斯岛拍摄移民。海因认为，美国的未来取决于其作为移民国家的身份——这一立场与不断升级的仇外恐惧形成鲜明对比。基于这项工作，倡导童工法的国家童工委员会聘请海因记录美国儿童的生活和工作条件。到 19 世纪后期，几个州通过了限制童工年龄和规定最长工作时间的法律。但在世纪之交，工作儿童的数量猛增。 1890 年至 1910 年间，10 至 15 岁的儿童中有 18% 有工作。在为全国童工委员会工作期间，海因走遍了工业化的南方的农场和工厂，以及东北部的街道和工厂。他使用带有 5 x 7 英寸玻璃底片的 Graflex 相机，并在夜间和室内拍摄时使用闪光粉，在他瘦小的身躯上拖着超过 50 磅的设备。为了进入工厂和其他设施，海因有时会伪装成圣经、明信片或保险推销员。其他时候，他会在外面等着赶上上班或下班的工人。除了照片记录，海因还收集了拍摄对象的个人故事，记录了他们的年龄和种族。他记录了他们的工作生活，例如他​​们的典型工作时间以及他们因劳动而遭受的任何伤害或疾病。 Hine 自认为是“带相机的调查员”，他利用这些信息创作了他所谓的“照片故事”——图像和文字的组合，可用于海报、公开讲座和已发表的报告，以帮助组织取得进展它的使命。 Hine 揭露黑幕的照片是纪实摄影类型的典范，这种类型依赖于摄影的感知真实性来为社会变革提供理由。 The camera serves as an eyewitness to a societal ill, a problem that needs a solution. Hine portrayed his subjects in a direct manner, typically frontally and looking straight into the camera, against the backdrop of the very factories, farmland or cities where they worked. By capturing details of his sitters' bare feet, tattered clothes, soiled faces and hands, and diminutive stature against hulking industrial equipment, Hine made a direct statement about the poor conditions and precarity of these children's lives. Notably, the National Child Labor Committee's efforts resulted in Congress establishing the Children's Bureau in 1912 and passing the Keating-Owen Act in 1916, which limited working hours for children and prohibited the interstate sale of goods produced by child labor. Although the Supreme Court later ruled it and the subsequent Child Labor Tax Law of 1919 unconstitutional, momentum for enshrining protections for child workers had been created. In 1938, Congress passed the Fair Labor Standards Act, which established restrictions and protections on employing children. The National Child Labor Committee's project also included advocacy for the enforcement of existing child labor regulations, a regulatory problem re-emerging today as the Department of Labor—the agency tasked with enforcing labor laws—comes under fire for failing to protect child workers. A recent surge of unaccompanied minors, primarily from Central America, has brought new attention to America's old problem of child labor and has threatened the very laws Hine and the National Child Labor Committee worked to enact. Some estimates suggest that around two-thirds of migrant children end up working full time, with some laboring more hours than current laws permit or working without the proper authorizations. Many of them perform hazardous jobs similar to those of Hine's subjects: handling dangerous equipment and being exposed to noxious chemicals in factories, slaughterhouses and industrial farms. While the content of Hine's photographs remains pertinent to today's child labor crisis, a key distinction between the subject of Hine's photographs and working children today is race. Hine focused his camera almost exclusively on white children who arrived in the country during waves of immigration from Europe during the late 19th and early 20th centuries. As art historian Natalie Zelt argues, Hine's pictorial treatment of Black children—either ignored or forced to the margins of his images—implied to viewers that the face of childhood in America was, by default, white. The perceived racial hierarchies of Hine's era reverberate into the present, where underage migrants of color live and work at the margins of society. Contemporary reports of child labor violations offer few images to accompany their texts, graphs and statistics. There are legitimate reasons for this. By not including identifying personal information or portraits, news outlets protect a vulnerable population. Ethical guidelines frown upon revealing private details of the lives of children interviewed. And, as Hine's experience demonstrates, it can be difficult to infiltrate the sites of these labor violations, since they are typically kept secure. Digital cameras and smartphones offer a workaround. Beginning in 2015, the International Labor Organization urged child laborers in Myanmar to become “young activists” and use their own images and words to create “photo stories”—echoing Hine's use of the term—that the organization could then disseminate. Photographs of child labor in foreign countries are far more common than those made in the US, which leaves the impression that child labor is someone else's problem, not ours. Perhaps it's too hard for Americans to look at this domestic issue square in the eyes. A similar effect is at work when viewing Hine's photographs today. While they were originally valued for their immediacy, they can seem to belong to a distant past. But if Hine's photographic archive of child laborers is evidence of the power of photography to sway public opinion, does the lack of images in today's reporting—even if nobly intended—create a disconnect? Is the public capable of understanding the harmful consequences of lack of labor enforcement when the faces of the people affected are missing from the picture? This article is republished from the Conversation under a Creative Commons license.阅读原文。 Beth Saunders is a curator, educator and photo historian. She oversees the management, preservation, and exhibition of the University of Maryland, Baltimore County's photography, rare book and archival collections. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-photographer-who-forced-the-us-to-confront-its-child-labor-problem" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Function calling and other API updates</stitle>; <id>;https://openai.com/blog/function-calling-and-other-api-updates</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T17:57:42.796315Z</updated>; <link href="https://openai.com/blog/function-calling-and-other-api-updates"/>; <author>; <name>;staranjeet</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=staranjeet</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;OpenAI has released updates to their GPT-3 and GPT-4 models, including the ability for developers to describe functions to the models and have them output JSON objects containing arguments to call those functions. The models also come with data privacy and security guarantees, and there are new API parameters that allow developers to describe functions to the model via JSON Schema. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#function-calling-and-other-api-updates" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36313348" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;CudaText: Cross-platform, open source code editor written in Object Pascal</stitle>; <id>;https://cudatext.github.io/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T16:57:42.796668Z</updated>; <link href="https://cudatext.github.io/"/>; <author>; <name>;open-source-ux</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=open-source-ux</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cudatext.github.io/img/cudatext-main.png" style="width: 220px; height: 123px;" />;<br />;CudaText is a cross-platform, open source code editor written in Object Pascal that starts up quickly and is extensible with Python add-ons. Its syntax parser is feature-rich and it has advantages over Sublime, as explained in its wiki. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cudatext-cross-platform-open-source-code-editor-written-in-object-pascal" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36306621" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;The Kentucky Derby is decadent and depraved (1970) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://brianb.freeshell.org/a/kddd.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023-06-13T08:57:42.797012Z</updated>; <link href="http://brianb.freeshell.org/a/kddd.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;The article follows the author's experiences at the Kentucky Derby, including his interactions with locals and his attempts to obtain press credentials. He also discusses the political climate surrounding the event, including the presence of the Black Panthers and white supremacists. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-kentucky-derby-is-decadent-and-depraved-1970-pdf" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36307418" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
